issue.title: Atlas falls while walking using keyboard_teleop

content.raw: Does the static movement work? for me it is just putting one step forward on the left leg and subsequent calls to I try to do the same thing (obviously unsuccessfully because the leg is fully extended)... it never transitions to shifting the right leg...
content.html: Does the static movement work? for me it is just putting one step forward on the left leg and subsequent calls to I try to do the same thing (obviously unsuccessfully because the leg is fully extended)... it never transitions to shifting the right leg...
